resources.string: PAINTHOME is a virtual paint app which can facilitate the user to paint the exterior and interior of their home as per their choice.It also helps user to calculate the cost and amount of paint required for the certain height and width input made by the user.This app also offers the list of dealers throughout the country which assists the user to find the paint dealer near to him.

Asian Paints Pvt. Ltd.
 
 Authorized : Surya Nepal Pvt. Ltd 
 
 Head Office:

Hint: \n If you are planning to color your home,you just need to be sure with the height and width of your wall,doors and windows.The metrics used be in feet.You can simply type in the height and width of it. Choose the quality of paint and quality of surface as per your desire.\n Go to the Color Pallette below and select the color from the various shades available.
